Sentencas: In this paper, a new dc-dc converter for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) powered auxiliary power unit (APU) is proposed.
Titulo: Low cost high efficiency DC-DC converter for fuel cell powered auxiliary power unit of a heavy vehicle

Sentencas: The proposed converter does not consider the leakage inductance of the transformer as a parasite and uses it for energy transfer, thus avoiding problems of low efficiency and difficulty in control, caused by leakage inductance.
Titulo: Low cost high efficiency DC-DC converter for fuel cell powered auxiliary power unit of a heavy vehicle

Sentencas: The need for a separate filter inductor is also eliminated.
Titulo: Low cost high efficiency DC-DC converter for fuel cell powered auxiliary power unit of a heavy vehicle

Sentencas: Soft switching is done for some of the switches of the proposed converter, thereby further increasing the efficiency of the converter.
Titulo: Low cost high efficiency DC-DC converter for fuel cell powered auxiliary power unit of a heavy vehicle

Sentencas: Thus, the achieved low cost and high efficiency of the proposed converter make it suitable for SOFC powered APU applications.
Titulo: Low cost high efficiency DC-DC converter for fuel cell powered auxiliary power unit of a heavy vehicle

Sentencas: Simulation and experimental results are presented to verify the proposed dc-dc converter.
Titulo: Low cost high efficiency DC-DC converter for fuel cell powered auxiliary power unit of a heavy vehicle

Sentencas: The achieved cost and efficiency of the prototype are 50.8$/kW and 90%, respectively.
Titulo: Low cost high efficiency DC-DC converter for fuel cell powered auxiliary power unit of a heavy vehicle
